name: Heponoid.
description:
There is a spaceship, your mission is to win in an unequal battle over forty space stations using only your vehicle's maneuverability and a plasma ball! Manage ship repel force field ball and win! Good luck.
The player controls a spaceship that acts as the game's "paddle" which prevents a ball from falling from the playing field, attempting to bounce it against a number of bricks. The ball striking a brick causes the brick to disappear. When all the bricks are gone, the player goes to the next level, where another pattern of bricks appears.
